thread.title: BRIEF-Crown Point Announces Filing Of Amended, Restated Preliminary Prospectus For Rights Offering

title: BRIEF-Crown Point Announces Filing Of Amended, Restated Preliminary Prospectus For Rights Offering
text:
April 7, 2018 / 1:21 AM / Updated 14 hours ago BRIEF-Crown Point Announces Filing Of Amended, Restated Preliminary Prospectus For Rights Offering Reuters Staff 
April 7 (Reuters) - Crown Point Energy Inc: 
* CROWN POINT ANNOUNCES FILING OF AMENDED AND RESTATED PRELIMINARY PROSPECTUS FOR RIGHTS OFFERING 
* ‍ TO ACQUIRE COMMON SHARES OF COMPANY FOR MINIMUM GROSS PROCEEDS OF US$8 MILLION AND MAXIMUM GROSS PROCEEDS OF US$12 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
